loose materials like plastic cans and

stage of recycling is called
reprocessing this is the bet where these
bales are turned into something new that
we can use again the bales are taken on
the back of big lorries for special
factories for reprocessing glass can be
melted down and made into new bottles
and the bales of cans can also be melted
and turned into new cans ready to be

it means we don't have to cut down new
